item.title: 高额电费正在左右美国大选
item.description: 随着数据中心和新工厂需求的增加，电力成本已成为一个全国性的热点问题。【原文：Electricity costs have become a national hot-button issue as data centers and new factories drive up demand.】

item.title: 亚马逊跃升 3,000 亿美元，让人工智能话题重回股票市场
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的股价在今年大部分时间里一直受到该公司云计算业务被竞争对手甩开的担忧的困扰。这些担忧暂时得到了平息。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. shares have been dogged for most of the year by concerns the company’s cloud-computing business was losing ground to rivals. Those fears have been put to rest for the time being.】

item.title: 贸易商权衡越南台风对出口的影响，罗布斯塔下跌
item.description: 罗布斯塔咖啡期货在伦敦下跌，原因是交易商权衡了来自世界头号咖啡豆种植国越南的更强劲出货量与预计将袭击该国主要产区的台风之间的利弊。【原文：Robusta coffee futures fell in London as traders balanced stronger shipments from Vietnam, the world’s top grower of the bean variety, against a typhoon expected to hit the nation’s key producing region.】

item.title: 卡塔尔今年将向埃及转让 35 亿美元用于地中海旅游景点建设
item.description: 到今年年底，埃及将从卡塔尔获得 35 亿美元，这笔地中海旅游投资可能为开罗从国际货币基金组织获得数十亿美元资金铺平道路。【原文：Egypt will get $3.5 billion from Qatar by the end of the year, with the Mediterranean tourism investment potentially paving the way for Cairo to unlock billions of dollars from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 新加坡电信出价 12 亿美元入股巴帝电信（Bharti Airtel），条款显示
item.description: 新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）的一个部门提出出售印度移动运营商巴蒂电信有限公司（Bharti Airtel Ltd.）的股份，根据出售条款，这笔交易可能获得 1035 亿卢比（12 亿美元）的收益。【原文：A Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. unit offered to sell shares in Indian mobile carrier Bharti Airtel Ltd. in a deal that may fetch 103.5 billion rupees ($1.2 billion), terms of the offering show.】

item.title: 欧盟要求将交易规则的资本影响延迟三年
item.description: 欧盟委员会正在考虑让银行在三年内免受对其交易活动的更高资本要求的影响，因为欧盟面临着压力，需要暂缓执行可能使其贷款人处于不利地位的措施。【原文：The European Commission is considering options to shield banks for three years from higher capital requirements on their trading activities, as the EU faces pressure to put off measures that could put its lenders at a disadvantage.】

item.title: 全文：英格兰银行决策者对利率的看法
item.description: 英格兰银行的最新决定为投资者提供了有史以来最详尽的信息，让他们了解其利率制定小组九位成员的观点范围。【原文：The Bank of England’s latest decision gives investors their most detailed look ever into the range of views across the nine members of its rate-setting panel.】

item.title: 调查显示：欧佩克上月产量上升，重启仍在继续
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，欧佩克上个月小幅提高了石油产量，因为主要成员国开始逐步重启另一层停止的供应。【原文：OPEC raised oil production slightly last month as key members began gradually restarting another layer of halted supplies, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 最高法院增添不确定性，但特朗普的关税决心仍是既定事实
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统利用广泛的权力征收其标志性关税的做法周三在最高法院遭到了一连串的质疑，这表明最高法院可能已经准备好进行干预。【原文：President Donald Trump’s use of broad powers to impose his signature tariffs faced a barrage of skeptical questions at the Supreme Court on Wednesday that signal it may be ready to intervene.】

item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道 Snap 在人工智能领域的大动作。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 地广人稀的挪威如何积累了 18 亿美元的财富
item.description: 在全球所有主权财富基金中，挪威是最不寻常的一个。这些与国家有关的巨型投资工具往往会挑选它们所持有的资产，以管理风险、实现收益最大化并促进国家战略利益。挪威银行投资管理公司则不然，该公司主要跟踪全球指数，以便从该国的石油和天然气收入中获取收益。【原文：Of all the world’s sovereign wealth funds, Norway’s is one of the most unusual. These giant, state-linked investment vehicles tend to pick and choose what assets they hold to manage risk, maximize returns and further national strategic interests. Not so with Norges Bank Investment Management, which largely tracks global indexes in order to generate an income from the country’s oil and gas revenues.】

item.title: 英国央行将利率维持在 4% 并预示 12 月降息
item.description: 英国央行在紧张的投票中将利率维持在 4%，为 12 月降息奠定了基础。【原文：The Bank of England held interest rates at 4% in a tight vote that laid the groundwork for a December cut.】

item.title: Propel 与 Column 合作扩大美国信贷覆盖范围
item.description: 加拿大金融科技公司Propel Holdings Inc.发表声明称，将与Plaid Inc.联合创始人William Hockey创办的银行Column N.A.合作，在全美范围内拓展消费贷款业务。【原文：Canadian fintech Propel Holdings Inc. is partnering with Column N.A., a bank founded by Plaid Inc. co-founder William Hockey, to expand its consumer-lending footprint across the US, according to a statement.】

item.title: Ziply 资产增加收入，BCE 超出分析师预期
item.description: BCE Inc. 第三季度的业绩超出分析师预期，原因是该公司的 Ziply Fiber 资产推动了收入增长和互联网用户数量的增加。【原文：BCE Inc. came ahead of analyst expectations in the third quarter as the firm’s Ziply Fiber asset drove revenue gains and internet subscriptions.】

item.title: 沃达康前员工和解预计耗资约 3200 万美元
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）报道，沃达康集团有限公司（Vodacom Group Ltd.）与一名前雇员达成赔偿和解，预计将花费公司约 5.5 亿兰特（约合 3200 万美元）。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd.’s settlement of a former employee’s claim for compensation is expected to cost the company about 550 million rand ($32 million), according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 在教练推动季度业绩增长后，Tapestry 上调业绩展望
item.description: Tapestry Inc. 在季度盈利超出预期后，上调了全年财政展望，尽管购物者更加谨慎，但该公司旗下的 Coach 品牌仍推动了销售增长。【原文：Tapestry Inc. raised its fiscal full-year outlook after quarterly earnings beat expectations, with the company’s Coach brand fueling sales growth despite a more cautious shopper.】

item.title: Krispy Kreme 实现正现金流，扭亏为盈
item.description: Krispy Kreme Inc.第三季度的运营现金为正值，这是三个季度以来的首次，也是自 2022 年底以来的最高值，因为这家甜甜圈制造商在 6 月份结束与美国麦当劳的合作关系后，继续推进其扭亏为盈计划。【原文：Krispy Kreme Inc. generated positive cash from operations in the third quarter for the first time in three quarters — and its highest since late 2022 — as the doughnut maker progressed with its turnaround plan following the end of its US McDonald’s partnership in June.】

item.title: SpaceX 向 EchoStar 支付 26 亿美元购买额外频谱
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）支持的拥有星链（Starlink）卫星互联网络的 SpaceX 公司同意以 26 亿美元的股票价格收购 EchoStar 公司未配对的 AWS-3 许可证，这是在两家公司 9 月份达成的协议基础上进行的。【原文：SpaceX, the Elon Musk-backed company that owns the Starlink satellite internet network, agreed to acquire EchoStar Corp.’s unpaired AWS-3 licenses for $2.6 billion in stock, building on an agreement the companies entered to in September.】

item.title: 巴菲特和巴克莱市场指标向股票牛市发出警告
item.description: 美国股市自四月低点以来飙升了 36%，令人眼花缭乱。现在，它正面临着投资传奇人物沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）所看好的一个机会。【原文：The US stock market has roared past every caution sign on its way to a dizzying 36% surge since the April lows. It’s now staring down one favored by investing legend Warren Buffett.】

item.title: 尽管面临美国关税阻力，申银万国仍希望在 2025 年实现 20 亿美元利润
item.description: 申银万国（Shein Group Ltd.）向投资者表示，该公司预计 2025 年的净收入将达到 20 亿美元的丰收水平，因为通过提价和削减成本提高了利润率，有助于克服唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的惩罚性关税造成的在线流量下降。【原文：Shein Group Ltd. has told investors that it’s expecting a bumper $2 billion in net income in 2025, after higher profit margins through price hikes and cost-cutting helped overcome a drop in online traffic caused by President Donald Trump’s punitive tariffs.】

item.title: 经济衰退担忧加剧，墨西哥央行可能下调关键利率
item.description: 墨西哥第三季度经济萎缩，重新引发了对今年经济衰退的担忧，预计墨西哥央行将继续降低借贷成本。【原文：Mexico’s central bank is expected to continue lowering borrowing costs after the economy contracted in the third quarter, reigniting concerns of a recession this year.】
